name: Akiva Glimpse
summary: Akiva Glimpse is a free VR adventure crafted for neurodivergent individuals, fostering self-exploration through vibrant worlds where learning feels like play! Engage in activities that boost cognitive and life skills, captivating neurotypical individuals too. Packed with colorful characters, it sparks curiosity for all. Try it free on SideQuest to have a peek at the full version of Akiva Verse!
